  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g2, String direction, int spriteNum, BufferedImage up1, BufferedImage up2, BufferedImage down1, BufferedImage down2, BufferedImage left1, BufferedImage left2, BufferedImage right1, BufferedImage right2, BufferedImage upNeutral, BufferedImage downNeutral, BufferedImage leftNeutral, BufferedImage rightNeutral, BufferedImage iceAfterHit, Boolean isFight, Boolean death, int x, int y)
      This method draws the entity on the screen. it takes the direction, sprite number, and the images of the entity
      Parameters:
      g2 - - the graphics object
      direction - - the direction of the entity
      spriteNum - - the number of the sprite for the moving effect
      up1 - - the images of the entity when it is moving to the up1
      up2 - - the images of the entity when it is moving to the up2
      down1 - - the images of the entity when it is moving to the down1
      down2 - - the images of the entity when it is moving to the down2
      left1 - - the images of the entity when it is moving to the left1
      left2 - - the images of the entity when it is moving to the left2
      right1 - - the images of the entity when it is moving to the right1
      right2 - - the images of the entity when it is moving to the right2
      upNeutral - - the image of the entity when it is not moving to the up
      downNeutral - - the image of the entity when it is not moving to the down
      leftNeutral - - the image of the entity when it is not moving to the left
      rightNeutral - - the image of the entity when it is not moving to the right
      iceAfterHit - - the image of the entity after it gets hit
      isFight - - boolean to check if the entity is fighting
      death - - boolean to check if the entity is dead
      x - - the x and y coordinates of the entity
      y - - the x and y coordinates of the entity
